Description: On US-33 in the County of Louisa, in the vicinity of Old Louisa Rd; Rt. 691N/S (Louisa County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 149 in the County of Goochland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The west right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On VA-288 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp to Ironbridge Road, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 61 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 280.7 in the City of Norfolk, near Military Highway, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-85 at mile marker 17 in the County of Mecklenburg, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left lane and right lane are closed.
